thread.title: UEFA charges England and Lithuania for crowd disturbances
thread.title_full: UEFA charges England and Lithuania for crowd disturbances - World - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: UEFA charges England and Lithuania for crowd disturbances
text:
UEFA has opened disciplinary cases against England and Lithuania over crowd disturbances in their final European Championship qualifier.
The Lithuanian federation has also been charged for breaching ticketing regulations by blocking stairways.
UEFA's disciplinary body will hear the case next Thursday.
England won Monday's match in Vilnius 3-0.
